Seek.NAME: Seek
Seek.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your draw pile and place them into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Blaster.NAME: Blaster
Blaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [B] for each Channeled Orb. NL Exhaust.

Reboot.NAME: Reboot
Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all of your cards into your draw pile, then draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Steam Power.NAME: Steam Power
Steam Power.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Blizzard.NAME: Blizzard
Blizzard.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.

Chill.NAME: Chill
Chill.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Frost for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
Chill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Channel !M! Frost per enemy. NL Exhaust.

Flux Capacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
Flux Capacitor.DESCRIPTION: Replace all Channeled Orbs with Plasma. NL Exhaust.

Hello World.NAME: Hello World
Hello World.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
Hello World.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.

Loop.NAME: Loop
Loop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, use the passive ability of your next Orb.

Scrape.NAME: Scrape
Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

Reprieve.NAME: Reprieve
Reprieve.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy does not intend to attack, gain !M! Focus.

Lockon.NAME: Lock-On
Lockon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For the next !M! turns, Lightning and Dark Orbs target this enemy.

Consume.NAME: Consume
Consume.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Lose 1 Orb Slot.

BootSequence.NAME: Boot Sequence
BootSequence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.
